resources.string: Please enter your full name and mobile phone number as it is in your bank account details.
By clicking Register, we assume you have read and agreed to our Terms and Conditions
You\'re welcome. With advanced features and quick response, we guarantee you will have a great experience using our app.
We have sent you a 6-digit OTP. Please enter it here and click VERIFY to proceed.
We have successfully verified your phone number. Click GET STARTED to continue.
Please enter the mobile phone number connected to your bank account here. We will send a 6-digit OTP code to the number.
We have successfully created your profile. Click GET STARTED to proceed.
Please touch the image to select a profile image and click SAVE to continue.
Welcome to miCash. Please enter your email and password to login.
Welcome %1$s. Please enter your password to login.
